game.name: Wasteland Corp
game.shortDescription: Wasteland Corp is a text-based post-apocalyptic simulation that brings cutting-edge local AI models into game experience. Command your corporate mercenary through a brutal wasteland filled with radiation, rival corporations, and mutant threats.
